elements.Text: Are others going to judge you when they see your haircut in the picture?

elements.name: Haircut Headache _Mental Health_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.

elements.text: In the real world, sometimes things don't go well. It's important to have some stories that end negatively to teach you to manage your anxiety when negative situations arise!
